properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA; Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 5:54PM EST until February 8 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and waves
2 to 5 ft expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA,
Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA and
Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA.

* WHEN...Until 5 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
